preGame.title: Pre-Game Setup
preGame.intro: MatchOps Local helps you track your teams' performance during games:
preGame.step1Desc: Add all available players with names. This is your master registry to select players from for games. You can add players at any time.
preGame.step2Desc: Organize players into teams if you have multiple squads (e.g., A-team, B-team, age groups). Teams can be reused across multiple games.
preGame.step3Desc: Create a season for long-term tracking or tournament for specific competitions. Get separate statistics for each tournament/season.
preGame.step4Desc: Set opponent, date, time, and game format. Link game to team and tournament/season if you want organized statistics.
preGame.step5Desc: Drag players from top bar onto field in your desired formation. Set goalkeeper, move players around, and plan positions.

afterGameSection.title: After the Game
afterGameSection.saveGame: Save game automatically or manually for later review
afterGameSection.assessPlayers: Rate player performance and add notes about each player's development
afterGameSection.viewStats: Review detailed statistics: goals, assists, playing time, ratings
afterGameSection.exportData: Export all your data in CSV format for further analysis or backup
afterGameSection.reviewGame: Review game events, tactical drawings, and formations

afterGame.title: After the Game

warmup.title: Match Preparation
warmup.section1Goal: Goal: Create a positive atmosphere and review the day's agenda.
section1Points: High fives, fist bumps, check-ins ‚Äì sharing how everyone is doing.
Day's themes (max 3, e.g.): Enjoy, Compete, Dribble or Pass.
Themes based on training ‚Äì can vary, but "Enjoy" is always included.
warmup.section2Goal: Goal: Raise body temperature, tune minds for the game.
section2Activities: Two lines + marker 5m away (cone/vest), circle around outside to the back of own line.
Jump to partner's side (2 times per movement).
Animal movements: inchworm, bear walk, duck walk (kids can suggest).
Sprints (approx. 5): standing start, sitting start, push-up start.
warmup.section3Goal: Goal: Activate ball touch and prepare for the game.
section3PairWorkPoints: Basic passing close ‚Üí further away (game stance, balls of feet, inside foot, care).
section3GoalieWarmupPoints: Throws/passes from close (2m) and further away:
Up, side, air, ground (getting used to the ball).
section3CombinedGoalieWarmupPoints: GK in goal ‚Üí wall pass ‚Üí shot from 16m / between pen. spot & box (coach can be wall).
warmup.section4Goal: Goal: Final preparations before the game.
section4Points: Timing just before entering the field (game leader ready).
duringGamePoints: Encourage good plays (e.g., fist bumps, "Yes!", "Just like we practiced!").
Let the player make their own decisions ‚Äì guide only off-the-ball players and subs if needed.

gdpr.deleteDescriptionCloud: To delete all cloud data, use the "Clear Cloud Data" option in the Premium tab.
gdpr.deleteDescriptionLocal: To delete all local data, use the "Hard Reset App" option in the About tab.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy for MatchOps

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: MatchOps is developed and operated by Ville Pajala, based in Finland. As the data controller, we are responsible for the processing of your personal data as described in this policy.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: MatchOps ("we", "our", "the app") is a local-first soccer coaching application. This privacy policy explains how we handle your information.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.localDataIntro: By default, all your data is stored locally on your device:

localDataItems.personnelInfo: Personnel information (names, roles, contact details if you choose to enter them)

dataStorage.localDataNote: We do not have access to this data. It never leaves your device unless you explicitly export it or enable cloud sync.
dataStorage.noAccountContent: MatchOps works entirely offline in local mode. No account creation, login, or personal information is required.
dataStorage.cloudDataIntro: If you enable Cloud Sync with a Premium subscription, your data is stored on secure cloud servers:

cloudDataItems.syncedData: Copied to our secure EU-based servers (Supabase, hosted in EU)
cloudDataItems.encryption: Encrypted in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest
cloudDataItems.rowLevelSecurity: Protected by row-level security (only you can access your data)

dataStorage.cloudDataNote: Cloud data is stored in secure EU-based data centers. You can delete your cloud data at any time from Settings.
dataStorage.dataRetentionContent: Cloud data is retained while your account is active. When you delete your cloud data or your account, data is permanently removed within 30 days. After cancellation, cloud data remains in read-only mode; after 90 days of account inactivity, it may be deleted. Local data remains on your device until you clear it. Consent records are retained even after account deletion for GDPR compliance.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Data Processing (GDPR Art. 6)
legalBasis.intro: We process personal data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.contract: Contract (Art. 6(1)(b)): Processing necessary for cloud sync service delivery
legalBasis.consent: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a)): Acceptance of Terms of Service and Privacy Policy for cloud mode users. Consent records are stored to demonstrate compliance
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f)): Error reporting via Sentry to maintain app quality and fix bugs. This processing involves minimal anonymized data and does not involve profiling or tracking. You can opt out in settings at any time

dataWeCollect.title: Data We May Collect
dataWeCollect.errorReportingIntro: When the app encounters an error, we may collect:
dataWeCollect.errorReportingNote: This helps us fix bugs and improve the app. Error reports do not contain your game data or player information. They are processed by Sentry.io (data may be processed in the US under Standard Contractual Clauses). You can disable error reporting in app settings at any time.
dataWeCollect.licenseValidationContent: When you purchase premium features, Google Play handles all payment processing. We verify license status through Play Store API but do not receive your payment information.
dataWeCollect.consentTrackingIntro: When you accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy in Cloud Mode, we record:
dataWeCollect.consentTrackingNote: This information is required for GDPR compliance to prove that valid consent was obtained (GDPR Art. 7(1)). Consent records are retained even after account deletion for legal purposes.
dataWeCollect.personnelDataIntro: When you add team personnel (coaches, assistants, medical staff), you may optionally enter:
dataWeCollect.personnelDataNote: This data is stored locally on your device (local mode) or in our secure EU-based database accessible only to you (cloud mode). Personnel contact information (email, phone) is considered personally identifiable information (PII) under GDPR. You are responsible for ensuring you have appropriate grounds to store their contact details.

dataWeDoNotCollect.title: Data We Do NOT Collect

items.gameContent: Game content, scores, or statistics (stored locally only, or in your private cloud account)
items.deviceIds: Device identifiers for tracking or advertising
items.playerNames: Player names or personal details (these are stored locally by you, or in your private cloud account)

dataWeDoNotCollect.personnelNote: Note: If you enter personnel contact information (email, phone), this is stored by your choice and under your control ‚Äî see the Personnel Data section in our full Privacy Policy.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services (Sub-processors)
thirdPartyServices.intro: We use the following third-party services to operate MatchOps. Data processing agreements are in place with each provider where required.
thirdPartyServices.sentryDesc: Error reporting and crash analysis (US, Standard Contractual Clauses).
thirdPartyServices.vercelDesc: PWA web hosting (Global edge network, Standard Contractual Clauses).

yourRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR and applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
yourRights.access: Access (Art. 15): View and export all your data at any time
yourRights.rectification: Rectification (Art. 16): Correct any inaccurate data directly in the app
yourRights.erasure: Erasure (Art. 17): Delete your local data or cloud data at any time
yourRights.portability: Portability (Art. 20): Export your data in standard JSON format
yourRights.restriction: Restriction (Art. 18): Switch to local-only mode to stop cloud processing
yourRights.objection: Objection (Art. 21): Stop cloud processing by switching to local mode, or disable error reporting in settings
yourRights.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent: Disable error reporting in settings; delete your cloud account to withdraw consent to cloud processing
yourRights.deleteLocal: For local data: Use Settings ‚Üí Data ‚Üí Your Data Rights
yourRights.deleteCloud: For cloud data: Use Settings ‚Üí Data ‚Üí Your Data Rights
yourRights.contactUs: All data management options are available directly in the app under Settings ‚Üí Data tab. No email request is needed ‚Äî you can self-serve all GDPR rights through the app interface.
yourRights.supervisoryAuthority: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. In Finland: Office of the Data Protection Ombudsman (Tietosuojavaltuutetun toimisto)

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: MatchOps is a tool designed for adult coaches, not for use by children. The app does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. Player names and statistics are entered by the coach (the app user), not by the players themselves. This data is stored locally on the coach's device or in their private cloud account and is never transmitted to us or any third party (except when cloud sync is enabled, in which case it is stored securely in the coach's private account). No age verification is required because the app collects data from coaches about their players, not directly from children.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.localIntro: In local mode, your data is stored in your browser's IndexedDB database:

localItems.deviceProtection: Protected by your device's access controls (screen lock, password, biometrics)
localItems.noAdditionalEncryption: Not additionally encrypted at rest beyond what your device/browser provides
localItems.noTransmission: No network transmission unless you enable Cloud Sync

dataSecurity.localNote: Your device's security is your primary protection for local data. We recommend using a strong screen lock.
dataSecurity.cloudIntro: In cloud mode, your data is protected by:

cloudItems.atRestEncryption: Encrypted at rest in secure EU-based servers (Supabase, Frankfurt)
cloudItems.rowLevelSecurity: Row-level security ensuring you can only access your own data
cloudItems.soc2: Backed by Supabase's security infrastructure and SOC 2 compliance

dataSecurity.backupContent: When you export your data, the backup file contains all your data including any personnel contact information. Backup files are not encrypted and should be stored securely. We recommend storing backup files in a secure location and deleting them after import.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy when necessary. Material changes will update the "Last Updated" date and Policy Version, trigger a re-consent prompt for cloud mode users on their next sign-in, and be available for review before acceptance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Most data requests can be handled directly in the app (Settings ‚Üí Data tab) without contacting us. For other privacy questions or concerns:

privacyPolicy.footer: This privacy policy applies to the MatchOps application available on Google Play Store.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service for MatchOps

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By downloading, installing, or using MatchOps ("the app"), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the app.

description.title: Description of Service
description.intro: MatchOps is a local-first soccer coaching application that helps coaches:
description.note: All data is stored locally on your device.

license.title: License Grant
license.intro: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use MatchOps for personal, non-commercial purposes in accordance with these terms.

restrictions.reverseEngineer: Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the app
restrictions.modify: Modify, adapt, or create derivative works
restrictions.distribute: Distribute, sublicense, or transfer the app to others
restrictions.illegal: Use the app for any illegal purpose
restrictions.removeNotices: Remove any copyright or proprietary notices

items.data: All data you enter into the app
items.backups: Maintaining backups of your data (using the export feature)
items.compliance: Ensuring your use complies with applicable laws
items.activity: Any activity that occurs through your use of the app

dataAndPrivacy.title: Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.content: Your data is stored locally on your device (local mode) or in our secure cloud database (cloud mode with subscription). See our Privacy Policy for details on data handling, security, GDPR rights, and what limited data we may collect.
dataAndPrivacy.securityAcknowledgmentIntro: By using MatchOps, you acknowledge that:

securityAcknowledgmentItems.localMode: Local mode: Data is stored in your browser's IndexedDB without additional encryption beyond what your device provides
securityAcknowledgmentItems.deviceSecurity: Device security: Your device's access controls (screen lock, password, biometrics) are your primary protection for local data
securityAcknowledgmentItems.backupFiles: Backup files: Exported backup files contain unencrypted data and should be stored securely
securityAcknowledgmentItems.personnelData: Personnel data: If you store personnel contact information (email, phone), it follows the same security model as other app data
securityAcknowledgmentItems.yourResponsibility: Your responsibility: You are responsible for protecting access to your device and backup files

dataAndPrivacy.securityAcknowledgmentNote: For additional security, enable cloud sync which provides server-side encryption, encryption at rest, and row-level security.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: MatchOps and all related trademarks, logos, and content are the property of the developer (Ville Pajala). You do not acquire any ownership rights by using the app.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.intro: The app is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to:
disclaimer.note: We do not warrant that the app will meet your specific requirements, be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free, or that any errors will be corrected.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law, in no event shall the developer be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, loss of data, profits, or business opportunities.
liability.note: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the app (if any).

items.localStorage: Data is stored locally on your device (or in cloud if enabled)
items.notResponsible: We are not responsible for data loss due to device failure, app uninstallation, or any other cause
items.backupAdvice: You should regularly export and backup important data

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.intro: The app may interact with third-party services:
thirdPartyServices.sentryDesc: For error reporting (optional, can be disabled)
thirdPartyServices.supabaseDesc: For cloud sync and authentication (Premium feature)
thirdPartyServices.note: Your use of these services is governed by their respective terms and policies.

premiumSubscription.title: Premium Subscription
premiumSubscription.intro: MatchOps Premium is an optional subscription that provides additional features:

features.cloudSync: Cloud Sync: Access your data across multiple devices
features.unlimitedEntities: Unlimited players, teams, seasons, and tournaments

premiumSubscription.billing: Subscriptions are billed through Google Play Store. See Google Play's terms for billing, cancellation, and refund policies.
premiumSubscription.cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time through Google Play. After cancellation, you retain access until the end of your billing period.
premiumSubscription.dataAfterCancel: If you cancel Premium, your cloud data remains accessible in read-only mode. You can export or delete it at any time. After 90 days of inactivity, cloud data may be deleted.

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync Terms

items.ownership: You retain ownership of all your data
items.availability: We strive for high availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access
items.backups: You are responsible for maintaining local backups of critical data
items.security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data

cloudSync.deletion: You can delete all cloud data at any time from Settings. Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.

changes.title: Changes to the App
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the app at any time and add or remove features.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We may update these terms when necessary. Material changes will update the "Last Updated" date and trigger a re-consent prompt for cloud mode users. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the app immediately, without notice, if you breach these terms. Upon termination, your license to use the app ends.
termination.cloudTermination: If your account is terminated, you will lose access to Cloud Sync features. Your local data will remain on your device. Cloud data will be deleted within 30 days of termination.
termination.voluntaryDeletion: You can voluntarily delete your cloud account and data at any time from the Settings menu.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Finland, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of the app shall be resolved in the courts of Helsinki, Finland.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these terms is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in effect.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the app.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Most actions (data export, deletion, account management) can be done directly in the app under Settings. For questions about these terms:

termsOfService.footer: These Terms of Service apply to the MatchOps application available on Google Play Store.

premium.limitExplanation: You've reached the free tier limit of {{limit}} {{resource}}.
premium.grantSuccess: Premium activated! You can reset in Settings.
premium.grantError: Failed to activate premium. Please try again.
premium.billingNotAvailable: Play Billing not available. Please try again.
premium.availableSoon: Premium upgrade will be available soon via Google Play!
premium.androidOnly: Subscriptions are available on the Android app.
premium.cloudUpgradeDescription: Cloud sync lets you backup and access your data from any device. Upgrade to premium to unlock this feature.

subscription.graceWarning: Your subscription has expired. Renew within {{days}} days to keep cloud access.
subscription.expiredWarning: Your subscription has expired. Renew to restore cloud access.

playBilling.restoreFailed: Failed to restore purchases. Please try again.

auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to sync your data across devices
auth.signUpSubtitle: Create an account to enable cloud sync
auth.resetSubtitle: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 12 characters and include 3 of: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account
auth.emailMayExist: If this email is not already registered, check your inbox for confirmation. If you already have an account, please sign in instead.
auth.resetEmailSent: Check your email for reset instructions
auth.networkErrorHint: Please check your internet connection and try again.
auth.termsConsent: I have read and agree to the
auth.consentRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
auth.androidOnlyRegistration: Don't have an account? Subscribe via the Android app.

reConsent.title: Updated Terms & Privacy Policy
reConsent.description: We have updated our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Please review and accept the new terms to continue using MatchOps.
reConsent.acceptCheckbox: I have read and agree to the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

migrationStatus.dontCloseApp: Please don't close the app during this process.
migrationStatus.successMessage: Your data has been migrated to improved storage for better performance.

migration.title: Migrate to Cloud
migration.description: Transfer your local data to your cloud account for backup and sync across devices.
migration.successDescription: Your data is now synced to the cloud.
migration.partialFailure: Migration was interrupted. Your local data is safe. Please try again.
migration.verificationFailed: Migration completed but verification failed. Please retry.
migration.networkError: Network error during migration. Your local data is unchanged.
migration.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to migrate your data to the cloud?
migration.confirmWarning: Your local data will remain unchanged. You can clear it after verifying the migration was successful.
migration.clearLocalPrompt: Would you like to clear local data? (Your cloud data is safe)
migration.clearFailed: Failed to clear local data. You can try again later in Settings.
migration.clearFailedAcknowledge: Failed to clear local data. You can clear it later from Settings, or try again now.
migration.switchToLocalFailed: Failed to switch to local mode.

warnings.cloudCleared: Existing cloud data was cleared before migration (replace mode)
warnings.title: Warnings

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.rateLimit: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.storage: Storage error. Please try again or contact support.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again with a stable connection.
errors.permission: Permission error. Please try signing out and back in.
errors.validation: Data validation failed. Please check your data and try again.

migration.modeMergeDesc: Merge with existing cloud data. Matching items will be updated.
migration.modeReplaceDesc: Clear all existing cloud data first, then upload fresh.
migration.modeReplaceWarning: Warning: Replace mode will delete all your existing cloud data before uploading.
migration.replaceWarningTitle: Replace mode will DELETE all existing cloud data!
migration.replaceWarningDesc: All your games, players, teams, seasons, and other data currently in the cloud will be permanently deleted before uploading your local data.
migration.replaceNoRollback: Warning: If migration fails after clearing, your cloud data cannot be recovered. Your local data will remain safe.
migration.bothHaveDataDesc: You have data stored locally and in the cloud. Choose how to proceed:
migration.localOnlyDesc: You have data stored locally that can be migrated to the cloud.

action.mergeDesc: Combine local and cloud data. Matching items will be updated from local.
action.replaceCloudDesc: Delete all cloud data and upload local data instead.
action.keepCloudDesc: Discard local data and continue using cloud data only.
action.migrateDesc: Upload your local data to the cloud for backup and sync.
action.startFreshDesc: Discard local data and start with an empty cloud account.
action.startFreshWarning: This will permanently delete your local data!
action.cancelDesc: Return to local mode and keep using local data.

migration.syncDescription: Your local data will be synced to the cloud for backup and access from other devices.
migration.loadDataFailed: Failed to load your data. Please try again.
migration.canRetryOrCancel: You can retry or close this dialog.
migration.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
migration.syncFailedUnknown: Sync failed due to an unknown error. Please try again.

syncStatus.offlineTitle: No internet connection - changes will sync when online

cloudSync.title: Account & Sync
cloudSync.cloudDescription: Your data syncs to the cloud. Access from any device after signing in.
cloudSync.cloudNoSubscription: You have a cloud account but sync is paused. Subscribe to enable cloud sync.
cloudSync.localDescription: Your data is stored locally on this device. Works offline, but data is not synced.
cloudSync.subscriptionRequiredDescription: Your account is active but cloud sync is paused. Subscribe to sync your data across devices.
cloudSync.notAvailable: Cloud sync is not available. This feature requires a premium subscription and server configuration.
cloudSync.notConfigured: Cloud sync is not configured. Please try again later.
cloudSync.enabledRestartRequired: Cloud mode enabled. Restart the app to apply changes.
cloudSync.disabledRestartRequired: Local mode enabled. Restart the app to apply changes.
cloudSync.enableFailed: Failed to enable cloud mode. Please try again.
cloudSync.enableError: An error occurred while enabling cloud mode.
cloudSync.disableFailed: Failed to switch to local mode. Please try again.
cloudSync.disableError: An error occurred while disabling cloud mode.
cloudSync.restartRequired: Restart the app to apply mode changes.
cloudSync.migrationNote: When you enable cloud sync, you can migrate your existing local data to the cloud.
cloudSync.clearWarningDescription: All your games, players, teams, seasons, and other data will be permanently deleted from the cloud.
cloudSync.clearNote: This will delete all your data from the cloud. Local data on this device will not be affected.
cloudSync.clearSuccess: All cloud data has been deleted.
cloudSync.clearError: Failed to clear cloud data. Please try again.
cloudSync.clearNetworkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
cloudSync.clearAuthError: Session expired. Please sign out and sign in again.
cloudSync.cloudUnavailable: Cloud is not available. Cannot clear cloud data.
cloudSync.wrongBackend: Cannot clear: not connected to cloud storage.
cloudSync.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
cloudSync.signOutNetworkError: Network error. You can continue using the app offline.
cloudSync.startOver: Start over with a different account
cloudSync.startOverError: Failed to start over. Please try again.

importLocalData.noData: No local data found to import.
importLocalData.checkFailed: Failed to check for local data. Please try again.
importLocalData.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

cloudAccount.title: Cloud Account
cloudAccount.hasCloudData: You have data stored in the cloud.
cloudAccount.deleteWarning: You will need to sign in again to delete your cloud data.
cloudAccount.deleteNote: This will permanently delete all your data from our servers.

syncDetails.pausedWarning: Sync is paused. Changes are saved locally and will sync when you resume.
syncDetails.cloudNotConnected: Cloud connection initializing... Changes will sync automatically when ready.

pendingSync.title: Unsynced Changes
pendingSync.warning: You have {{count}} changes that haven't been synced to the cloud yet.
pendingSync.consequence: Switching to local mode now will abandon these changes.
pendingSync.syncFailed: Sync failed. Please try again or discard changes.

cloudAuth.description: Sign in to delete your cloud data.

errors.signInFailed: Sign in failed. Please try again.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in.
errors.rateLimit: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.moduleLoadFailed: Failed to load cloud services. Please check your connection and try again.

confirm.title: Confirm Deletion
confirm.warning: This will permanently delete ALL your data from our servers:

success.title: Cloud Data Deleted
success.description: All your data has been permanently removed from our servers.

reverseMigration.title: Switch to Local Mode
reverseMigration.description: Download your cloud data to this device and switch to local mode.
reverseMigration.localDataWarning: Cloud data will be merged with existing local data. Duplicates may occur.

preview.title: Your Cloud Data
preview.description: You have the following data stored in the cloud:
preview.loadError: Failed to load cloud data preview.

choose.title: What should happen to your cloud data?
choose.description: Choose what happens to your cloud data when you switch to local mode.
choose.keepCloudDescription: Your data stays in Supabase. You can re-enable cloud sync later without losing anything.
choose.deleteCloudDescription: After download, all your data will be removed from our servers. This cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Confirm Cloud Deletion
confirm.keepCloudSummary: Your data will be downloaded to this device. Your cloud data will remain intact.
confirm.deleteCloudSummary: Your data will be downloaded to this device, then permanently deleted from the cloud.
confirm.warning: After downloading your data, ALL cloud data will be permanently deleted from our servers.

complete.title: Switch Complete!
complete.description: Your data has been downloaded to this device.
complete.deletedDescription: Your data has been downloaded and cloud data has been deleted.
complete.cloudDeleted: Your cloud data has been permanently deleted.
complete.cloudKept: Your cloud data has been preserved.
complete.reloadNote: The page will reload to apply changes

error.title: Migration Failed
error.description: An error occurred during migration. Your data has not been changed.
error.maxRetries: Maximum retries reached. Please try again later.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.instruction: Choose how you want to get started
welcome.subtitle: Track your team's games, players, and stats
welcome.startLocalDesc: Your data is saved on this device only.
welcome.signInCloud: Sign in or create an account
welcome.signInCloudAria: Sign in or create a free account
welcome.importBackupDesc: Restore your previous data from a file and continue where you left off.
welcome.changeInSettings: You can change this later in Settings
welcome.useCloudSyncDesc: Sync your data across all your devices.
welcome.useCloudSyncAria: Use cloud sync, access from any device
welcome.signInCloudDescFree: Create a free account. Subscribe anytime to sync across devices.
welcome.signInCloudDescWithPrice: Create a free account. Cloud sync available for ‚Ç¨4.99/month.
welcome.signInOnlyAria: Sign in to existing cloud account
welcome.androidRequired: New here? Subscribe via the Android app.

page.refreshPageManuallyContinue: Please refresh the page manually to continue
page.importSucceededRefresh: Import succeeded. Please refresh the page manually.
page.failedToSwitchLocalMode: Failed to switch to local mode
page.couldNotCheckLocalData: Could not check for local data. Please refresh the page to try again.
page.couldNotCheckCloudData: Could not check cloud data. Your data will load automatically.
page.unableToCheckSync: Unable to check data for sync. Please refresh if you have data to sync.
page.failedToSwitchLocalModeRetry: Failed to switch to local mode. Please try again.
page.refreshingAfterBackground: Refreshing app after extended background period...
page.unableToRefreshApp: Unable to refresh app. Please close and reopen.
page.gameDataNotFound: Error: Could not find game data for {{gameId}}

page.legacyDataMigrated_other: Your data has been migrated to your account ({{count}} items)
page.legacyMigrationFailed: Could not migrate your data. Please try again later.
page.dataLoadedFromCloud: Your data has been loaded from the cloud.
page.failedToLoadCloudData: Failed to load your cloud data. Please try refreshing.
page.partialSyncComplete: Sync complete. Some cloud data may not have loaded - refresh to retry.
page.alreadyOpenDesc: MatchOps is already open in another tab. Please close this tab or the other one to continue.
page.connectionTimeoutDesc: Unable to connect to the server. This can happen after the app has been in the background for a while.
page.resyncFailed: Failed to re-sync. Please try again.
page.factoryResetFailed: Failed to reset. Please try again.
page.factoryResetOffline: Cannot delete cloud data while offline. Please check your connection and try again.

deleteBlocked.title: Cannot Delete "{{name}}"
deleteBlocked.archiveOption: You can archive it instead, which will:
deleteBlocked.hideFromLists: Hide it from lists and dropdowns
deleteBlocked.canRestore: Allow you to restore it later
deleteBlocked.deleteHint: To permanently delete, first remove all references (reassign games to another {{type}} or delete them).
